hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd prod-dns-pointer wget https://releases.hashicorp.com/terraform/0.12.31/terraform_0.12.31_linux_amd64.zip && unzip terraform_0.12.31_linux_amd64.zip && mv terraform /usr/local/bin/ terraform init
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 900 --role-arn "arn:aws:iam::${cnc_acct_id}:role/system/jenkins-s3-role" --role-session-name "teardown-rebuild" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 cp s3://$stack_s3_bucket/deployment_state_metadata/terraform.tfstate_prod_dns terraform.tfstate || echo "prod_dns state doesnt exist, it will be created" aws s3 cp s3://$stack_s3_bucket/deployment_state_metadata/${target_prod_stack}/stack_variables.tf . aws s3 cp s3://$stack_s3_bucket/deployment_state_metadata/${target_prod_stack}/subnet_variables.tf .
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 900 --role-arn "arn:aws:iam::${app_acct_id}:role/hms-dbmi-cnc-role" --role-session-name "teardown-rebuild" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
#terraform destroy -auto-approve -var="target-prod-stack=${target_prod_stack}" -var="target-next-prod-stack=${target_next_prod_stack}" || true terraform apply -auto-approve -var="target-prod-stack=${target_prod_stack}" -var="target-next-prod-stack=${target_next_prod_stack}" || true
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 900 --role-arn "arn:aws:iam::${cnc_acct_id}:role/system/jenkins-s3-role" --role-session-name "teardown-rebuild" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 cp terraform.tfstate s3://$stack_s3_bucket/deployment_state_metadata/terraform.tfstate_prod_dns
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
